name: S.cape
description:
S.cape is a short game about helping Mochi to get through all the Dungeon rooms and be free!

Features:
• There are 4 enemy types, each with a unique behavior
• Different obstacles types will be introduced with game progression

Game Design / Programming: 
ディーオ (Dio)

Art Direction / 3D Modelling: 
ピケレン (PKelen) - patriciakelen.com

Audio / Sounds:
Main Theme (Funk Lead Loop - https://freesound.org/people/ehohnke/)
Dungeon (Creepy Dungeon Ambience - https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/)
Torch (Fire Crackle and Flames 002 - https://freesound.org/people/FractalStudios/)
Player Falling (Game Die - https://freesound.org/people/josepharaoh99/)
Player Death (Life Lost Game Over - https://freesound.org/people/noirenex/)
Opening Door (Game FX #10 - https://freesound.org/people/danlucaz/)
Level Complete 1 (Game Sound Intro To Game - https://freesound.org/people/Bertrof/)
Level Complete 2 (Success - https://freesound.org/people/Abacagi/)
End Screen (Jazz piano intro - https://freesound.org/people/Piotr123/)
